summary: Defines a comprehensive configuration schema for on‑policy reinforcement learning trainers, exposing parameters for dataset processing, batch sizing, rollout forward passes, generation settings, model location, and distributed execution, and integrates with HuggingFace’s argument parser for command‑line use.
business_intent: Enable users to conveniently specify and manage all hyperparameters required for on‑policy training pipelines, supporting reproducibility, scalability across GPUs, and optional model publishing.
